q: Since his return, in October, Ben Roethlisberger has tried to be a better teammate and a better person. Like the Eagles' Michael Vick , he has been contrite and has said all the right things. It would be amazing to win another Super Bowl, but it won't be like I'll say,` Do you forgive me now?' It'll just be another step in earning back everything I lost, he told the Pittsburgh Post-Gazette's Ron Cook last week. Ben Roethlisberger faced the national media for the first time yesterday afternoon at the Steelers' hotel in Fort Worth, Texas, and it didn't take long

Andy Coulson has been under strain over allegations of widespread hacking of mobile phone messages by journalists at the News of the World when he was editor of the paper, from which he resigned in 2007. I can today confirm that I've resigned as Downing Street director of communications, Andy Coulson said in a statement.`` Unfortunately, continued coverage of events connected to my old job at the News of the World has made it difficult for me to give the 110 percent needed in this

to write a script for Ridley Scott that could either become the Alien prequel or something more unique? It seems that they went with the`` original film'' angle, based on what Ridley Scott told Deadline: `` While Alien was indeed the jumping off point for this project, out of the creative process evolved a new, grand mythology and universe in which this original story takes place. The keen fan will recognize strands of Alien's DNA, so to speak, but the ideas tackled in this film are unique, large and provocative. I couldn't be more pleased to have found the singular tale I'd been searching for, and finally return to this genre that's so close to my heart. " Ridley Scott will direct the project with Noomi Rapace in the lead as`` Elizabeth Shaw ,'' who is apparently a scientist. Simon Cowell has made his mark`` by going against the grain and having the courage to say exactly what is on his mind.''`` I'm not a master of anything,'' says Simon Cowell . I think what I'm good at is making shows or records which a lot of people will like for the same reasons I like them. He says he truly trusts his own instincts and when evaluating talent, doesn't necessarily think of himself as a person running a record company or in charge of a TV show.``

about working with both him and Sergey for a long time to come.''`` Eric Schmidt has clearly done an outstanding job leading Google for the last decade,'' Larry Page said in a written statement. The results speak for themselves. There is no other CEO in the world that could have kept such headstrong founders so deeply involved and still run the business so brilliantly. Eric Schmidt is a tremendous leader and I have learned innumerable lessons from him. His advice and efforts will be invaluable to me as I start in this new role. Google still has such incredible opportunity... and I can't wait to get started.
